column4: I just don't know. I love breakfast food so I've been wanting to come here since I heard they were opening. However
column5: comments about waits scared me away. Then
column6: I had a friend visiting from out of town and the only time we could meet up was for breakfast. Conveniently
column7: they were one of the few options near her hotel and was open by 6:30. When we walked in the doors right around 6:30
column8: there were only a few cars in the parking lot and less than five tables taken.
